After the success of the first Escape From Chicago compilation, here's the sequel: 16 post-footwork cuts showcasing the global talent outside footwork's birthplace in Chicago. The comp features a mix of established names like Leatherface (aka Kaptain Cadillac) and Bones & Money (Tuff Wax), previous Loose Squares artists like Sinistarr, Calculon, and Slick Shoota, and exciting new faces like Nphonix and DJ Downrock. The music itself runs the gamut: there are no-nonsense juke floor-fillers like ?Soundin So Mean?, footwork-jungle hybrids like ?Coming Correct?, bashment-flavored cuts like ?Hotta Than That?, and creepy-crawly nightmare cuts like ?Tower of Scissors?. This one is BIG.
